name: Throw Down
description:
Throw down is a wild and wacky, action packed, local multiplayer game. With a push of a button destroy the floor, making your opponents fall to their doom. Dodge level hazards and your rivals to be the last man standing. If you like throwing random objects at your friends, this game is for you!

Throw Down is heavily inspired by Kirby 's Crystal Shards mini games and has been designed to bring an arcade-style action game to your fingertips by using low-poly graphics, and great original music. Whether you want to play at home versus your friends, alone in the single player tournament mode, or online in our online matchmaking,  players will have no shortage of butt kicking fun.

Characters:

  • 8 playable characters
  • Each character has multiple different skin variations
  • Each character has a random object they throw
  •  4 unique Shot Types to chose from -  Straight, Lob, and Remote Control Detonation (RC)

Levels:

  • 4 playable levels
  • Fun low poly design
  • Unique stage hazards

Controls:

  • Up, Down, Left, Right movement
  • 'A' button to throw objects
  • 'A' button to detonate shot (if using RC character)

This version of Throw Down only supports Xbox controls.

Current build allows for only local multiplayer game play.
